member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.FormatProviders.Pdf.PdfExportSettings.ContentsDeflaterCompressionLevel
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating the compression level to be used when deflating images. -1 = Default Compression. 0 = No Compression. 9 = Best Compression. The default is -1.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.FormatProviders.Pdf.PdfExportSettings.ContentsCompressionMode
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating the compression mode used when compressing page contents

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.FormatProviders.Pdf.PdfExportSettings.ImagesCompressionMode
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating the compression mode used when compressing images

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.FormatProviders.Pdf.PdfExportSettings.ImagesDeflaterCompressionLevel
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating the compression level to be used when deflating images. -1 = Default Compression. 0 = No Compression. 9 = Best Compression. The default is -1.

member.name: F:Telerik.Windows.Documents.FormatProviders.Pdf.PdfImagesCompressionMode.Deflate
member.summary: Use the deflate algorithm to compress the images. Use PdfExportSettings.ImagesDeflaterCompressionLevel to specify the compression ratio.

member.name: F:Telerik.Windows.Documents.FormatProviders.Pdf.PdfImagesCompressionMode.Jpeg
member.summary: Use JPEG to compress the images. This mode is only supported for images that are imported as JPEGs.

member.name: F:Telerik.Windows.Documents.FormatProviders.Pdf.PdfImagesCompressionMode.Automatic
member.summary: Automatically choose the best algorithm to compress the images.
